resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
wesm commented on pull request #5222: ARROW-6381: [C++] BufferOutputStream does extra work that slows down small writes
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5222
 
 
   Before:
   
   ```
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Benchmark                                        Time           CPU Iterations
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   BufferOutputStreamSmallWrites/real_time  218998806 ns  218938001 ns         18   584.478MB/s
   ```
   
   After
   
   ```
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Benchmark                                        Time           CPU Iterations
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   BufferOutputStreamSmallWrites/real_time  144975400 ns  144954334 ns         30   882.908MB/s
   ```
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

wesm commented on issue #5222: ARROW-6381: [C++] BufferOutputStream does extra work that slows down small writes
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5222#issuecomment-525951974
 
 
   I found this when looking at Parquet perf data (this is used there, it might be better to use BufferBuilder instead)
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.

pitrou commented on issue #5222: ARROW-6381: [C++] BufferOutputStream::Write does extra work that slows down small writes
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5222#issuecomment-526054777
 
 
   Interesting. I wonder if `BufferOutputStream` should rely on `BufferBuilder` or if that would degrade performance.
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

pitrou commented on issue #5222: ARROW-6381: [C++] BufferOutputStream::Write does extra work that slows down small writes
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5222#issuecomment-526054777
 
 
   Interesting. I wonder if `BufferOutputStream` should rely on `BufferBuilder` or if that would degrade performance.
   
   (for example the current growth pattern in `BufferOutputStream::Reserve` may be suboptimal)
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

users@infra.apache.org

pitrou commented on issue #5222: ARROW-6381: [C++] BufferOutputStream::Write does extra work that slows down small writes
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5222#issuecomment-526089659
 
 
   Current benchmarks here:
   ```
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Benchmark                                        Time           CPU Iterations
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   BufferOutputStreamTinyWrites/real_time    40346155 ns   40231527 ns         52   793.136MB/s
   BufferOutputStreamSmallWrites/real_time   15462451 ns   15438635 ns        100   2.02099GB/s
   BufferOutputStreamLargeWrites/real_time   14104049 ns   14066428 ns        178   2.17907GB/s
   ```
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the

pitrou commented on issue #5222: ARROW-6381: [C++] BufferOutputStream::Write does extra work that slows down small writes
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5222#issuecomment-526089659
 
 
   I experimented with different growth strategies. Current benchmark here after the latest changes:
   ```
   BufferOutputStreamTinyWrites/real_time    38842098 ns   38811158 ns         54   823.848MB/s
   BufferOutputStreamSmallWrites/real_time   12242574 ns   12192992 ns        171   2.55252GB/s
   BufferOutputStreamLargeWrites/real_time   10782802 ns   10746764 ns        195   2.85025GB/s
   ```
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

users@infra.apache.org

pitrou commented on issue #5222: ARROW-6381: [C++] BufferOutputStream::Write does extra work that slows down small writes
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5222#issuecomment-526225474
 
 
   For the record, here are the results on a Windows 7 VM. It will be interesting to check if mimalloc improves those numbers:
   ```
   --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   ------------------
   Benchmark                                        Time             CPU   Iterations UserCounters...
   --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   ------------------
   BufferOutputStreamTinyWrites/real_time    90775594 ns     90725806 ns 31 bytes_per_second=352.518M/s
   BufferOutputStreamSmallWrites/real_time   32634961 ns     32567771 ns 83 bytes_per_second=980.525M/s
   BufferOutputStreamLargeWrites/real_time   31290053 ns     31250000 ns 91 bytes_per_second=1005.79M/s
   ```
   
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

wesm commented on issue #5222: ARROW-6381: [C++] BufferOutputStream::Write does extra work that slows down small writes
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5222#issuecomment-526244052
 
 
   Thanks @pitrou!
   
   > Interesting. I wonder if BufferOutputStream should rely on BufferBuilder or if that would degrade performance.
   
   Probably, it seems a bit weird to have two implementations of nearly the same thing. https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6388

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: {{Write}} calls into {{BufferOutputStream::Reserve}} which does a surprising amount of work. I suggest streamlining the implementation and adding benchmarks for the many-small-writes case
fields.summary: [C++] BufferOutputStream::Write is slow for many small writes
